function.script:
package com.haima.sage.bigdata.script

import org.apache.commons.lang3.time.FastDateFormat
import java.util.Date

import com.haima.sage.bigdata.etl.common.model.RichMap
import org.apache.flink.api.common.state.ListStateDescriptor
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.scala.function.ProcessWindowFunction
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.TimeWindow
import org.apache.flink.util.Collector

/** *
 *
 * ProcessWindowFunction一次性迭代整个窗口里的所有元素
 *
 * @param < IN> RichMap: 输入
 * @param < OUT> RichMap: 输出
 * @param < RichMap> key 的类型
 * @param < W> The type of { @code Window} that this window function can be applied on.
 */
class $name extends ProcessWindowFunction[RichMap, RichMap, String, TimeWindow] {

  private lazy val lsd = new ListStateDescriptor[Double]("alarm", classOf[Double])

  /**
   * Evaluates the window and outputs none or several elements.
   *
   * @param key      计算窗口的key
   * @param context  计算窗口的context
   * @param elements 计算窗口的元素
   * @param out      输出
   */
  // tslint:disable-next-line:max-line-length
  override def process(key: String, context: Context, elements: Iterable[RichMap],
                       out: Collector[RichMap]): Unit = {
    val data = elements.toList.sortBy(_.getOrElse("log_time","").toString)
    val codes = data.flatMap(ele => {
      ele.get("errorCode").filter(_.toString != "").map(v => (v.toString, 1)).toSeq
    })
    val dataSize = data.size
    val errorCodeSize = codes.size
    val top10 = codes.groupBy(_._1).mapValues(t => t.size).toList.sortBy(-_._2).take(10).map {
      tuple =>
        (tuple._1 -> Map(s"count" -> tuple._2,
          s"in_error_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / errorCodeSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble,
          s"in_data_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / dataSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
        ))
    }
    val top = top10.toMap
    val sdf_day = FastDateFormat.getInstance("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    val log_time = data.head.get("log_time") match {
      case Some(x: Date) => x.getTime.toString
      case Some(x: String) => x
      case _ => null
    }
    val top_str = "  \n> 错误码      数量 错误占比      会话占比"+System.getProperty("line.separator")+ "\n>"
    val top_res:StringBuilder = new StringBuilder
    for (elem <- top10) {
      top_res.append(elem._1 + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("count", "") + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_error_rate", "") + "% " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_data_rate", "") + "% ").append(System.getProperty("line.separator")).append("\n>")
    }

    val error_code_rate = ((errorCodeSize.toDouble * 100) / dataSize.toDouble).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
    val state = context.globalState.getListState(lsd)
    import scala.collection.JavaConverters._

    if(state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.size > 60){
      state.update((state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.tail :+ error_code_rate).asJava)
    }else{
      state.add(error_code_rate)
    }
    val avg:Double =  state.get().asScala.toList.sum / state.get().asScala.toList.size
    
    val  avg_list = state.get().asScala.toList

    out.collect(RichMap(Map("data_size" -> dataSize, "error_code_size" -> errorCodeSize,
      "error_code_rate" -> error_code_rate,
      "error_code_rate_avg" -> avg,
      "avg_ist" -> avg_list,
      "top" -> top,
      "top10" -> (top_str + top_res),
      "log_time_start" -> data.head.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "log_time_end" -> data.last.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "bid" -> data.last.getOrElse("access_key_id", ""),
      "bid_name" -> data.last.getOrElse("bid_name", ""),
      "idc" -> data.head.getOrElse("idc_cn_name", ""),
      "async_field" -> (data.last.getOrElse("access_key_id", "")+"_"+data.head.getOrElse("idc_cn_name", "")+"_"+sdf_day.parse(sdf_day.format(new Date(log_time.toLong))).getTime),
      "alert_type" -> "errorCode_bid_idc")).filter(x => x._2 != "" || x._2 != "null"))
  }

}

package com.haima.sage.bigdata.script

import com.haima.sage.bigdata.etl.common.model.RichMap
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.scala.function.ProcessWindowFunction
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.TimeWindow
import java.util.Date

import org.apache.commons.lang3.time.FastDateFormat
import org.apache.flink.api.common.state.ListStateDescriptor
import org.apache.flink.util.Collector

/** *
 *
 * ProcessWindowFunction一次性迭代整个窗口里的所有元素
 *
 * @param < IN> RichMap: 输入
 * @param < OUT> RichMap: 输出
 * @param < RichMap> key 的类型
 * @param < W> The type of { @code Window} that this window function can be applied on.
 */
class $name extends ProcessWindowFunction[RichMap, RichMap, String, TimeWindow] {
  private lazy val lsd = new ListStateDescriptor[Double]("alarm", classOf[Double])

  /**
   * Evaluates the window and outputs none or several elements.
   *
   * @param key      计算窗口的key
   * @param context  计算窗口的context
   * @param elements 计算窗口的元素
   * @param out      输出
   */
  // tslint:disable-next-line:max-line-length
  override def process(key: String, context: Context, elements: Iterable[RichMap],
                       out: Collector[RichMap]): Unit = {
    val data = elements.toList.sortBy(_.getOrElse("log_time","").toString)
    val codes = data.flatMap(ele => {
      ele.get("errorCode").filter(_.toString != "").map(v => (v.toString, 1)).toSeq
    })
    val dataSize = data.size
    val errorCodeSize = codes.size
    val top10 = codes.groupBy(_._1).mapValues(t => t.size).toList.sortBy(-_._2).take(10).map {
      tuple =>
        (tuple._1 -> Map(s"count" -> tuple._2,
          s"in_error_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / errorCodeSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble,
          s"in_data_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / dataSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
        ))
    }
    val top = top10.toMap
    val sdf_day = FastDateFormat.getInstance("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    val log_time = data.head.get("log_time") match {
      case Some(x: Date) => x.getTime.toString
      case Some(x: String) => x
      case _ => null
    }
    val top_str = "  \n> 错误码      数量 错误占比      会话占比" + System.getProperty("line.separator") + "\n>"
    val top_res: StringBuilder = new StringBuilder
    for (elem <- top10) {
      top_res.append(elem._1 + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("count", "") + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_error_rate", "") + "% " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_data_rate", "") + "% ").append(System.getProperty("line.separator")).append("\n>")
    }

    val error_code_rate = ((errorCodeSize.toDouble * 100) / dataSize.toDouble).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
    val state = context.globalState.getListState(lsd)
    import scala.collection.JavaConverters._

    if (state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.size > 60) {
      state.update((state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.tail :+ error_code_rate).asJava)
    } else {
      state.add(error_code_rate)
    }
    val avg: Double = state.get().asScala.toList.sum / state.get().asScala.toList.size
    
    val  avg_list = state.get().asScala.toList

    out.collect(RichMap(Map("data_size" -> dataSize, "error_code_size" -> errorCodeSize,
      "error_code_rate" -> error_code_rate,
      "error_code_rate_avg" -> avg ,
      "avg_ist" -> avg_list,
      "top" -> top,
      "top10" -> (top_str + top_res),
      "log_time_start" -> data.head.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "log_time_end" -> data.last.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "bid" -> data.last.getOrElse("access_key_id", ""),
      "bid_name" -> data.last.getOrElse("bid_name", ""),
      "client_type" -> data.head.getOrElse("client_type", ""),
      "client_name" -> data.head.getOrElse("client_name", ""),
      "async_field" -> (data.last.getOrElse("access_key_id", "") + "_" + data.head.getOrElse("event_key", "") + "_" + sdf_day.parse(sdf_day.format(new Date(log_time.toLong))).getTime),
      "alert_type" -> "errorCode_bid_clientType")).filter(x => x._2 != "" || x._2 != "null"))
  }

}

    for (elem <- top10) {
      top_res.append(elem._1 + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("count", "") + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_error_rate", "") + "% " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_data_rate", "") + "% ").append(System.getProperty("line.separator")).append("\n>")
    }
    val error_code_rate = ((errorCodeSize.toDouble * 100) / dataSize.toDouble).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
    val state = context.globalState.getListState(lsd)
    import scala.collection.JavaConverters._

    if(state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.size > 60){
      state.update((state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.tail :+ error_code_rate).asJava)
    }else{
      state.add(error_code_rate)

    val  avg_list = state.get().asScala.toList

    out.collect(RichMap(Map("data_size" -> dataSize, "error_code_size" -> errorCodeSize,
      "error_code_rate" -> error_code_rate,
      "avg_ist" -> avg_list,
      "top" -> top,
      "error_code_rate_avg"-> avg ,
      "top10" -> (top_str + top_res),
      "log_time_start" -> data.head.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "log_time_end" -> data.last.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "bid"-> data.head.getOrElse("access_key_id",""),
      "bid_name"-> data.head.getOrElse("bid_name",""),
      "async_field" -> (data.last.getOrElse("access_key_id", "") + "_" + sdf_day.parse(sdf_day.format(new Date(log_time.toLong))).getTime),
      "alert_type"->"errorCode_bid")).filter(x=> x._2 !="" || x._2 != "null"))
  }

}

package com.haima.sage.bigdata.script

import java.util.Date

import com.haima.sage.bigdata.etl.common.model.RichMap
import org.apache.commons.lang3.time.FastDateFormat
import org.apache.flink.api.common.state.ListStateDescriptor
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.scala.function.ProcessWindowFunction
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.TimeWindow
import org.apache.flink.util.Collector
/***
 *
 * ProcessWindowFunction一次性迭代整个窗口里的所有元素
 *
 * @param < IN> RichMap: 输入
 * @param < OUT> RichMap: 输出
 * @param < RichMap> key 的类型
 * @param < W> The type of { @code Window} that this window function can be applied on.
 */
class $name extends ProcessWindowFunction[RichMap,RichMap,String, TimeWindow]{

  private lazy val lsd = new ListStateDescriptor[Double]("alarm", classOf[Double])

  /**
   * Evaluates the window and outputs none or several elements.
   *
   * @param key      计算窗口的key
   * @param context  计算窗口的context
   * @param elements 计算窗口的元素
   * @param out      输出
   */
  // tslint:disable-next-line:max-line-length

  override def process(key: String, context: Context, elements: Iterable[RichMap],
                       out: Collector[RichMap]): Unit = {
    val data = elements.toList.sortBy(_.getOrElse("log_time","").toString)
    val codes = data.flatMap(ele => {
      ele.get("errorCode").filter(_.toString != "").filter(_.toString !="100211005").map(v => (v.toString, 1)).toSeq
    })
    val dataSize = data.size
    val errorCodeSize = codes.size
    val top10 = codes.groupBy(_._1).mapValues(t => t.size).toList.sortBy(-_._2).take(10).map {
      tuple =>
        (tuple._1 -> Map(s"count" -> tuple._2,
          s"in_error_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / errorCodeSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble,
          s"in_data_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / dataSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
        ))
    }
    val top = top10.toMap
    val sdf_day = FastDateFormat.getInstance("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    val log_time = data.head.get("log_time") match {
      case Some(x: Date) => x.getTime.toString
      case Some(x: String) => x
      case _ => null
    }
    val top_str = "  \n> 错误码      数量 错误占比      会话占比"+System.getProperty("line.separator")+ "\n>"
    val top_res:StringBuilder = new StringBuilder
    for (elem <- top10) {
      top_res.append(elem._1 + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("count", "") + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_error_rate", "") + "% " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_data_rate", "") + "% ").append(System.getProperty("line.separator")).append("\n>")
    }

    val error_code_rate = ((errorCodeSize.toDouble * 100) / dataSize.toDouble).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
    val state = context.globalState.getListState(lsd)
    import scala.collection.JavaConverters._

    if(state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.size > 60){
      state.update((state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.tail :+ error_code_rate).asJava)
    }else{
      state.add(error_code_rate)
    }
    val avg:Double =  state.get().asScala.toList.sum / state.get().asScala.toList.size

    val  avg_list = state.get().asScala.toList

    out.collect(RichMap(Map("data_size" -> dataSize, "error_code_size" -> errorCodeSize,
      "error_code_rate" -> error_code_rate,
      "error_code_rate_avg" -> avg,
       "avg_ist" -> avg_list,
      "top" -> top,
      "top10" -> (top_str + top_res),
      "log_time_start" -> data.head.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "log_time_end" -> data.last.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "client_type"-> data.head.getOrElse("client_type",""),
      "client_name"-> data.head.getOrElse("client_name",""),
      "async_field" -> (data.head.getOrElse("client_type", "")+"_"+sdf_day.parse(sdf_day.format(new Date(log_time.toLong))).getTime),
      "alert_type"->"errorCode_clientType")).filter(x=> x._2 !="" || x._2 != "null"))
  }

}

package com.haima.sage.bigdata.script

import com.haima.sage.bigdata.etl.common.model.RichMap
import org.apache.flink.api.common.state.ListStateDescriptor
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.scala.function.ProcessWindowFunction
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.windows.TimeWindow
import org.apache.flink.util.Collector
/***
 *
 * ProcessWindowFunction一次性迭代整个窗口里的所有元素

class $name extends ProcessWindowFunction[RichMap,RichMap,String, TimeWindow]{

  private lazy val lsd = new ListStateDescriptor[Double]("alarm", classOf[Double])

  /**
   * Evaluates the window and outputs none or several elements.
   *
   * @param key      计算窗口的key
   * @param context  计算窗口的context
   * @param elements 计算窗口的元素
   * @param out      输出
   */
  // tslint:disable-next-line:max-line-length
  override def process(key: String, context: Context, elements: Iterable[RichMap],
                       out: Collector[RichMap]): Unit = {
    val data = elements.toList.sortBy(_.getOrElse("log_time","").toString)
    val codes = data.flatMap(ele => {
      ele.get("errorCode").filter(_.toString != "").map(v => (v.toString, 1)).toSeq
    })
    val dataSize = data.size
    val errorCodeSize = codes.size
    val top10 = codes.groupBy(_._1).mapValues(t => t.size).toList.sortBy(-_._2).take(10).map {
      tuple =>
        (tuple._1 -> Map(s"count" -> tuple._2,
          s"in_error_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / errorCodeSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble,
          s"in_data_rate" -> ((tuple._2.toDouble * 100) / dataSize).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
        ))
    }
    val top = top10.toMap

    val top_str = "  \n> 错误码      数量 错误占比      会话占比"+System.getProperty("line.separator")+ "\n>"
    val top_res:StringBuilder = new StringBuilder
    for (elem <- top10) {
      top_res.append(elem._1 + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("count", "") + " " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_error_rate", "") + "% " + elem._2.getOrElse("in_data_rate", "") + "% ").append(System.getProperty("line.separator")).append("\n>")
    }

    val error_code_rate = ((errorCodeSize.toDouble * 100) / dataSize.toDouble).formatted("%.1f").toDouble
    val state = context.globalState.getListState(lsd)
    import scala.collection.JavaConverters._

    if(state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.size > 60){
      state.update((state.get().iterator().asScala.toList.tail :+ error_code_rate).asJava)
    }else{
      state.add(error_code_rate)
    }
    val avg:Double =  state.get().asScala.toList.sum / state.get().asScala.toList.size

    val  avg_list = state.get().asScala.toList

    out.collect(RichMap(Map("data_size" -> dataSize, "error_code_size" -> errorCodeSize,
      "error_code_rate" -> error_code_rate,
      "error_code_rate_avg" -> avg,
      "avg_list"-> avg_list,
      "top" -> top,
      "top10" -> (top_str + top_res),
      "log_time_start" -> data.head.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "log_time_end" -> data.last.getOrElse("log_time", ""),
      "alert_type"->"errorCode_all")))
  }

}

dataSource.SELECT: SELECT * FROM t_dict_meta where id> ? order by id asc
